attributes.action: Keep the present definition for Mcjobs as it is accurate description
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mcdonalds want to change the definition of a Mcjob into a more positive light. 

While at the moment the definition is entirely accurate and therefore should not be changed.

The following definition of a Mcjob was written by a group of employees and is the current one at the moment:
" A job, usually in the retail or service sector, that is low paying, often temporary, and offers minimal or no benefits or opportunity for promotion"

Where as now the company executives want to change it to: McDonald Kids 
"McDonald Wives 
McDonald House 
McDonald Economy, not bad for a mcjob"

I am writing this petition because i am a Mcdonalds crew member and do feel that they should not change the definition unless the company change how they treat all there staff in a fairer way.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
